title: One Piece; Why Hody Jones is one of the greatest villains in the One Piece franchise
author: The Birds of Hermes
description: An analytical article examining Hody Jones as a villain representing environmental racism and inherited hatred. Discusses the significance of the 'Nothing' revelation and how it makes Hody a thematically profound antagonist despite being personally despicable.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the complete Fish-Man Island Arc

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 554 – 574) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the latter portion of the Fish-Man Island Arc, including episodes 563-564 which reveal Hody's backstory and Fukaboshi's plea to Luffy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full spoilers for Fish-Man Island Arc episodes 554-574

title: 563-564: "A Shocking Fact! the True Identity of Hordy!" and "Back to Zero! Earnest Wishes for Luffy!"
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A first-time viewer's perspective on episodes 563-564, discussing reactions to the 'Nothing' twist and Hody's revelation as a villain born from environmental hatred.

title: Episode 564 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 564 including plot summary, character appearances, production details, and trivia.

title: Hody Jones Is The Best Villain Ever
author: Blerds Online
description: An article defending Hody Jones as an excellent villain for representing systemic racism and environmental hatred, arguing that his lack of a tragic backstory is what makes him compelling.

title: Hody Jones - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive character wiki page for Hody Jones including his backstory revealed in episodes 563-564, his role as antagonist, and character analysis.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Complete character information through Fish-Man Island Arc

title: One Piece Author Reveals Why He Created Hody Jones
author: GameRant
description: Article discussing Eiichiro Oda's intentions in creating Hody Jones as a character to help readers understand racism and inherited prejudice.
